description: Details of SUDS (for under-build units only) required by part condition 8 of planning permission 2021/3580/P dated 14/10/2022 (Demolition of existing storage sheds and infill development on the existing Tybalds Estate including erection of three blocks, two mews terraces, and conversion of the lower ground floor of three existing blocks to provide a total of 56 residential homes comprising 28 affordable and 28 market units with associated community space, alterations to existing residential block entrances, provision of a lift to existing Devonshire Court, refuse facilities, public realm improvements, alterations to parking layout, cycle parking, landscaping and associated works).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
